attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon Prime Minister and the Government to reverse the decision to remove the patriotic symbol, Britannia, from the 50 pence coin. For more than 300 years this symbol has appeared on British currency and is a national symbol of Britain, known worldwide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
